headline: This Monster Dividend Growth Stock Is Up 86% in the Last Year
summary: Philip Morris International stock is up 86% in the last 12 months.  The company is growing quickly in nicotine pouches and heat-not-burn devices.  Cigarettes still provide steady cash flow and should help the dividend keep growing in the years to come.
